original_text: But Joab and Abishai pursued Abner, and as the sun was setting, they came to the hill of Ammah, near Giah on the way to the wasteland of Gibeon.
korean_text: 요압과 아비새가 아브넬의 뒤를 쫓아 기브온 거친 땅의 길 가 기아 맞은쪽 암마 산에 이를 때에 해가 졌고

sentences.original_text: But Joab and Abishai pursued Abner
and as the sun was setting
they came to the hill of Ammah
near Giah on the way to the wasteland of Gibeon
sentences.korean_translation: 기브온 황무지로 가는 길가에 있는 기아 근처에
